analysis.description:
PetOwnership (/unique_chucks/23/0x876c6fbec71a498155cfa811f9d10fd3bb67e4c5.sol#253-282) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/23/0x876c6fbec71a498155cfa811f9d10fd3bb67e4c5.sol#256-265)

Reentrancy in PreSale.generateUniquePets (/unique_chucks/23/0x876c6fbec71a498155cfa811f9d10fd3bb67e4c5.sol#379-402):
	External calls:
	- (childGenes,childQuality) = geneScience.uniquePet(newPetId) (/unique_chucks/23/0x876c6fbec71a498155cfa811f9d10fd3bb67e4c5.sol#397-399)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokensCount (/unique_chucks/23/0x876c6fbec71a498155cfa811f9d10fd3bb67e4c5.sol#400-402)

Reentrancy in EggPurchase.purchaseEgg (/unique_chucks/23/0x876c6fbec71a498155cfa811f9d10fd3bb67e4c5.sol#323-362):
	External calls:
	- (childGenes,childQuality) = geneScience.openEgg(userNumber,quality) (/unique_chucks/23/0x876c6fbec71a498155cfa811f9d10fd3bb67e4c5.sol#349-351)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokensCount (/unique_chucks/23/0x876c6fbec71a498155cfa811f9d10fd3bb67e4c5.sol#353-362)

PetOwnership.ownerOf.owner (local variable @ /unique_chucks/23/0x876c6fbec71a498155cfa811f9d10fd3bb67e4c5.sol#277) shadows:
	- Ownable.owner (state variable @ /unique_chucks/23/0x876c6fbec71a498155cfa811f9d10fd3bb67e4c5.sol#10-11)

PreSale.getPet.breedTimeout (local variable @ /unique_chucks/23/0x876c6fbec71a498155cfa811f9d10fd3bb67e4c5.sol#405-407) shadows:
	- PopulationControl.breedTimeout (state variable @ /unique_chucks/23/0x876c6fbec71a498155cfa811f9d10fd3bb67e4c5.sol#104)

PreSale.getPet.owner (local variable @ /unique_chucks/23/0x876c6fbec71a498155cfa811f9d10fd3bb67e4c5.sol#407-408) shadows:
	- Ownable.owner (state variable @ /unique_chucks/23/0x876c6fbec71a498155cfa811f9d10fd3bb67e4c5.sol#10-11)

PreSale.generateUniquePets has external calls inside a loop:
	- (childGenes,childQuality) = geneScience.uniquePet(newPetId) (/unique_chucks/23/0x876c6fbec71a498155cfa811f9d10fd3bb67e4c5.sol#397-399)
